flourish.options.torchflower.tooltip: Allows torchflowers to be spread by bonemeal.
flourish.options.use_tall_flower_behavio: Replaces Bedrock Edition behavior with classic Flora Doubling behavior. Essentially, instead of spreading small flowers it spawns a small flower item in the world.
flourish.options.wither_rose.tooltip: Allows wither roses to be spread by bonemeal.
